title: Happy Birthday, Kotori-san!
detail_text: <:th_ch0203/>Happy birthday, Kotori-san!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Waaah, thank you so much, Shizuku-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>I hope this will be the beginning of another year of healthy and fruitful days ahead of you, Kotori-san. To celebrate, I’m going to act for you!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eeeh!? I’m happy, but it would be a waste if I were to enjoy one of your plays by myself, Shizuku-chan....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>No, I came up with this one specifically for you, Kotori-san. That’s why I’d like for you to see it today!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Eeeeeeh!? W-, why are you going to such lengths for me!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>In the past, you had fixed one of my stage costumes, Kotori-san. And not only did you fix it, but you made it even more special. I don’t think I’ve thanked you enough for that, so....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Ah.... Are you talking about the Juliet costume!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Yes! Kotori-san, will you accept my present?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0003/>Of course! Thank you, I’m so happy!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
